author: TravisEz13
body:
## Steps to reproduce

1. Install the daily formula: https://github.com/PowerShell/homebrew-tap#powershell-daily

1. start a powershell session (mine was version 7.1.0-daily.20200609)

1. Wait for a new version (mine was version 7.1.0-daily.20200610)

1. in the 7.1.0-daily.20200609 session run
```powershell
ls /
```

## Expected behavior

```none
❯❯❯ ls /
Applications	System		Volumes		cores		etc		opt		sbin		usr
Library		Users		bin		dev		home		private		tmp		var
```

## Actual behavior

```none
```




## Steps to reproduce

* Install the daily formula: https://github.com/PowerShell/homebrew-tap#powershell-daily

start a powershell session (mine was version 7.1.0-daily.20200609)

Wait for a new version (mine was version 7.1.0-daily.20200610)

in the 7.1.0-daily.20200609 session run
```powershell
get-help get-help
```

## Expected behavior

```none

NAME
    Get-Help

SYNTAX
    Get-Help [[-Name] <string>] [-Path <string>] [-Category {Alias | Cmdlet | Provider | General | FAQ | Glossary | HelpFile | ScriptCommand | Function | Filter | ExternalScript | All | DefaultHelp
    | DscResource | Class | Configuration}] [-Full] [-Component <string[]>] [-Functionality <string[]>] [-Role <string[]>] [<CommonParameters>]

    Get-Help [[-Name] <string>] -Detailed [-Path <string>] [-Category {Alias | Cmdlet | Provider | General | FAQ | Glossary | HelpFile | ScriptCommand | Function | Filter | ExternalScript | All |
    DefaultHelp | DscResource | Class | Configuration}] [-Component <string[]>] [-Functionality <string[]>] [-Role <string[]>] [<CommonParameters>]

    Get-Help [[-Name] <string>] -Examples [-Path <string>] [-Category {Alias | Cmdlet | Provider | General | FAQ | Glossary | HelpFile | ScriptCommand | Function | Filter | ExternalScript | All |
    DefaultHelp | DscResource | Class | Configuration}] [-Component <string[]>] [-Functionality <string[]>] [-Role <string[]>] [<CommonParameters>]

    Get-Help [[-Name] <string>] -Parameter <string[]> [-Path <string>] [-Category {Alias | Cmdlet | Provider | General | FAQ | Glossary | HelpFile | ScriptCommand | Function | Filter |
    ExternalScript | All | DefaultHelp | DscResource | Class | Configuration}] [-Component <string[]>] [-Functionality <string[]>] [-Role <string[]>] [<CommonParameters>]

    Get-Help [[-Name] <string>] -Online [-Path <string>] [-Category {Alias | Cmdlet | Provider | General | FAQ | Glossary | HelpFile | ScriptCommand | Function | Filter | ExternalScript | All |
    DefaultHelp | DscResource | Class | Configuration}] [-Component <string[]>] [-Functionality <string[]>] [-Role <string[]>] [<CommonParameters>]


ALIASES
    None


REMARKS
    Get-Help cannot find the Help files for this cmdlet on this computer. It is displaying only partial help.
        -- To download and install Help files for the module that includes this cmdlet, use Update-Help.
        -- To view the Help topic for this cmdlet online, type: "Get-Help Get-Help -Online" or
           go to https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=2096483.

```

## Actual behavior

```none
Get-Help: Could not load file or assembly 'System.Xml.XPath, Version=5.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a'. The system cannot find the file specified.
```

## Environment data

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

```none
Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      7.1.0-daily.20200609
PSEdition                      Core
GitCommitId                    7.1.0-daily.20200609
OS                             Darwin 19.5.0 Darwin Kernel Version 19.5.0: Tue May 26 20:41:44 PDT 2020; root:xnu-6153.121.2~2/RELEASE_X86_64
Platform                       Unix
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0…}
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
WSManStackVersion              3.0
```
title: Updating PowerShell on macOS with a running session causes issues
